t: Brand Name vs Seller Name -- Please Help Clarify for a ...
s: June 12, 2019 - Others with more expertise will ... an introduction. A “brand” is created by a manufacturer. This is not an Amazon thing, specifically. You “create your brand” off of Amazon, it is not something you do through Amazon. Then, once you have an existing brand, you bring it to sell on Amazon. t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
